snippet.title: Sonic World DX - Anniversary Demo [Reveal Trailer]
snippet.description:
Sonic World is now celebrating it's 5th Anniversary!
And we do that by giving you people a hands-on preview of what we've been working on!

---[WARNING]---
Entering a warp ring with a shield will make your game crash, this was discovered after the demo had been packed up for release, sorry for that.

---[The Sonic World DX Server]---
https://discord.gg/W9QhhC4

---[The Sonic World Website]---
https://sonicworldfangame.com/

---[Download]---
[Google Drive]
https://drive.google.com/open?id=1GThOwtf91cRuYPn1gJg6BQuhpwz-umOq

https://mega.nz/#!udxRjSaT!Akd_DMwy5Np3cbb0t-TYF_cr3LIoxKvE3XMXWSJLPnc

http://www.mediafire.com/file/g4g3i8o3cqoezqb/Sonic_World_DX_-_Anniversary_Demo.rar/file
